scripts.doctoc: doctoc README.md && if [[ $(git diff --shortstat 2> /dev/null | tail -n1) != '' ]]; then git add README.md && git commit --no-verify -m 'table of contents update'; fi

futureResearch.note0: the following options are from joeybaker/generator-iojs as a reference for future exploration
futureResearch.test-browser: browserify -t coverify test/test.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b chrome | tap-spec
futureResearch.test-all: npm run test-server && npm run test-browser
futureResearch.note1: we can't have nice things. prepublish also runs on npm install https://github.com/npm/npm/issues/6394 in-publish hacks around this
futureResearch.prepublish: in-publish && npm prune && npm run gitPush || in-install
futureResearch.note2: eslint will always pull from the global eslintrc file, disable that so that we're only looking at the local
futureResearch.note3: travis doesn't play nicely with !#/bin/bash in the script file, so we have to explicitly set bash
futureResearch.dmn: dmn gen -f . && if [[ $(git diff --shortstat 2> /dev/null | tail -n1) != '' ]]; then git add .npmignore && git commit --no-verify -m'update npmignore'; fi
futureResearch.release: source ./scripts.sh && npm run requireGitClean && npm run gitPull && npm run dmn && npm run doctoc && npm run lint && npm test && npm_release $@
